description: It indicates the primary and secondary port of UAPS module has
swapped.

event.Summary: Primary and secondary port of UAPS module has swapped due to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSwappedTrap ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPortWorkingStatus i 1 ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSwapReason i 1 ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsGroupName s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPrimaryPortList o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSecondaryPortList o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1

description: It indicates which port group is in working state.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPortWorkingStatus

description: It indicates the reason of swap.
failback(1): Primary port is recovery.
failoverByPhyLinkDown(2): Primary port is in fault of physical
layer.
failoverByIpLinkDown(3): Primary port is in fault of IP layer.
forceSwap(4): Force swap.
swapByPhyLinkUp(5): In upPortNum mode, swap may be caused by
physical link up.
swapByPortAdded(6): Swap caused by adding new port.
swapByPortDeleted(7): Swap caused by deleting port.
swapBySwapModeChanged(8): Swap caused by changing swap mode.
noSwap(255): No swap.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSwapReason

description: The name of UAPS group.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsGroupName

description: The primary UAPS ports. The maximum port numbers joined in this
port list should not be more than 4.
Each member of this variable is ifIndex of a port.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPrimaryPortList

description: The secondary UAPS ports. The maximum port numbers joined in this
port list should not be more than 4. Furthermore, the port numbers
joined in this port list should be equal to the
zxAnUapsPrimaryPortList's. Each number of this variable is ifIndex
of a port.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSecondaryPortList

description: A zxAnUapsSwappedAlm is sent when the agent has detected that
the primary/secondary ports of UAPS module have swapped.

event.Summary: Port ($v1) of UAPS module have swapped due to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSwappedAlm ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPortWorkingStatus i 1 ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSwapReason i 1 ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsGroupName s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPrimaryPortList o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSecondaryPortList o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1

description: It indicates which port group is in working state.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPortWorkingStatus

description: It indicates the reason of swap.
failback(1): Primary port is recovery.
failoverByPhyLinkDown(2): Primary port is in fault of physical
layer.
failoverByIpLinkDown(3): Primary port is in fault of IP layer.
forceSwap(4): Force swap.
swapByPhyLinkUp(5): In upPortNum mode, swap may be caused by
physical link up.
swapByPortAdded(6): Swap caused by adding new port.
swapByPortDeleted(7): Swap caused by deleting port.
swapBySwapModeChanged(8): Swap caused by changing swap mode.
noSwap(255): No swap.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSwapReason

description: The name of UAPS group.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsGroupName

description: The primary UAPS ports. The maximum port numbers joined in this
port list should not be more than 4.
Each member of this variable is ifIndex of a port.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsPrimaryPortList

description: The secondary UAPS ports. The maximum port numbers joined in this
port list should not be more than 4. Furthermore, the port numbers
joined in this port list should be equal to the
zxAnUapsPrimaryPortList's. Each number of this variable is ifIndex
of a port.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-UAPS-MIB::zxAnUapsSecondaryPortList

description: A zxAnUapsSwappedClr trap is sent when the agent
has detected that the zxAnUapsSwappedAlm is cleared manually.
